article: george e. pataki picked up the endorsement of the teachers ' union in yonkers _ and with the new york city teachers ' union expected to follow suit imminently _ h. carl mccall joined several educators on tuesday to denounce the governor 's education record .
abstract: as teachers back pataki mccall questions motives
